alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 22 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS Child Abduction Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of North Carolina Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE RUTHERFORD COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR MALAKAI BLAKE GREENE. MALAKAI BLAKE GREENE IS A 3 YEAR OLD WHITE MALE APPROXIMATELY 3 FEET TALL WEIGHING 45 POUNDS. HE HAS BLONDE HAIR AND HAZEL EYES. THE ABDUCTOR ALYSSA GREENE IS DESCRIBED AS A WHITE FEMALE APPROXIMATELY 5 FEET 5 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 220 POUNDS WITH RED HAIR AND GREEN EYES. THEY WERE LAST SEEN TRAVELING FROM CENTENNIAL RD IN UNION MILLS NC POSSIBLY HEADING TO CHARLOTTE NC IN A GRAY 2012 DODGE JOURNEY WITH NC PLATE KAW-7288. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION CALL RUTHERFORD COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IMMEDIATELY AT 828-286-2911 OR CALL 911 OR STAR-47. THIS IS A AMBER ALERT ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION NC STATEWIDE
